title: Prince: Legacy of Darkness
features: Reminiscent of John Milton's, "Paradise Lost" and Anne Rice', "Memnoch the Devil. Before earth there was light. Before light there was darkness. Join the world's first vampire, as he narrates a tale that starts before the universe was created, and into a future that might bring forth the end of days. This is a fast-paced thriller that will leave the reader spellbound to a world filled with vampires, witches, werewolves, dragons, angels and demons in a freshly imagined beginning to a story never told. A classic in the making!
description: Born June 9th, 1982 in Atlanta, GA. Moved to Detroit, MI at the age of 7, where he spent his formal years. Attended the University of Michigan- Ann Arbor, where he graduated in 2004, with a Bachelor of Arts. Phoenix spent most of his 20s working the in fitness industry before he decided to put his writing talents to good use. 2015 will mark his debut novel, Prince: Legacy of Darkness. Two more novels will follow Legacy of Darkness to complete the Prince Trilogy. Phoenix lives in Miramar, FL with his wife and daughters.
